title: Wand of light
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Type | Wand                                                                            |
| :--- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Wand of light                                                                   |
| Icon | [![Wand of light.png](/images/0/05/Wand_of_light.png)](/File:Wand_of_light.png) |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A magical device which fires a ray of searing light, injuring and blinding those struck. Only living, demonic, and angelic monsters can be blinded. Tougher monsters will recover their vision more quickly. |

The **wand of light** fires a powerful, somewhat inaccurate, ray of light which [blinds](/Blind "Blind") enemies. It can pierce through monsters like a bolt.

Players will deal `4d(5.5 + 10.5 * Evocations/20)` untyped damage with this wand.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) Players have a [to-hit](/To-hit "To-hit") of `10.6 + (3.5 * Evocations)/25`.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

Monsters will deal `3d(7 + (30 + HD)/12)` damage with this wand.[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

When the wand damages a valid monster, it has a 100% chance to blind it for `54/HD to 2 * 54/HD` turns (min. 1-2 turns).[\[4\]](#cite_note-4) [Nonliving](/Nonliving "Nonliving"), [plant](/Holiness#Plant "Holiness"), and [undead](/Undead "Undead") holiness monsters cannot be blinded, and a few others are [immune](/Category:Unblindable "Category:Unblindable"). If it deals damage to the player, it has a 1/3 chance of [confusing](/Confuse "Confuse") them for 2-3 turns instead.[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)

It is [mutually exclusive](/Alternate_items "Alternate items") with the [wand of acid](/Wand_of_acid "Wand of acid") and [wand of quicksilver](/Wand_of_quicksilver "Wand of quicksilver").

## Tips & Tricks

Wands of light inflict strong, untyped damage and disables monsters for a few turns. When blinded, monsters treat you as [invisible](/Invisible "Invisible") (even with [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible")), it'll make them less likely to hit or use abilities. Thus, it is valuable as both an offensive and defensive tool.

Light can be especially useful for [stabbers](/Stab "Stab"), since it can blind monsters regardless of their HD or willpower. It can't blind [orbs of fire](/Orbs_of_fire "Orbs of fire"), but it can blind [pandemonium lords](/Pandemonium_lord "Pandemonium lord") and other types of tough opponents.

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), players will be blinded instead of confused when damaged by a wand of light.
- Piror to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), wands of light could blind [nonliving](/Nonliving "Nonliving") and [undead](/Undead "Undead") monsters.
- The wand of light was added in [0.29](/0.29 "0.29").

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [zap-data.h:1424](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.31.0/crawl-ref/source/zap-data.h#L1424) (0.31.0)  
   Specifically, you'll deal `4d(13/4 + 3 * pow/20)` damage, for pow = `15 + 3.5 * Evocations` ([evoke.cc:189](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.31.0/crawl-ref/source/evoke.cc#L189) (0.31.0)). If you have the [MP-Powered Wands](/MP-Powered_Wands "MP-Powered Wands") mutation, then your "pow" gains a +33% boost.
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [zap-data.h:1425](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.31.0/crawl-ref/source/zap-data.h#L1425) (0.31.0)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [zap-data.h:1426](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.31.0/crawl-ref/source/zap-data.h#L1426) (0.31.0)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [beam.cc:4883](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.31.0/crawl-ref/source/beam.cc#L4883) (0.31.0)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [beam.cc:4050](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.31.0/crawl-ref/source/beam.cc#L4050) (0.31.0)

Name Wand of light
Icon
A magical device which fires a ray of searing light, injuring and blinding those struck. Only living, demonic, and angelic monsters can be blinded. Tougher monsters will recover their vision more quickly.

The wand of light fires a powerful, somewhat inaccurate, ray of light which blinds enemies. It can pierce through monsters like a bolt.

Players will deal 4d(5.5 + 10.5 * Evocations/20) untyped damage with this wand.[1] Players have a to-hit of 10.6 + (3.5 * Evocations)/25.[2]

Monsters will deal 3d(7 + (30 + HD)/12) damage with this wand.[3]

When the wand damages a valid monster, it has a 100% chance to blind it for 54/HD to 2 * 54/HD turns (min. 1-2 turns).[4] Nonliving, plant, and undead holiness monsters cannot be blinded, and a few others are immune. If it deals damage to the player, it has a 1/3 chance of confusing them for 2-3 turns instead.[5]

It is mutually exclusive with the wand of acid and wand of quicksilver.

Tips & Tricks

Wands of light inflict strong, untyped damage and disables monsters for a few turns. When blinded, monsters treat you as invisible (even with see invisible), it'll make them less likely to hit or use abilities. Thus, it is valuable as both an offensive and defensive tool.

Light can be especially useful for stabbers, since it can blind monsters regardless of their HD or willpower. It can't blind orbs of fire, but it can blind pandemonium lords and other types of tough opponents.

History

  • In 0.32, players will be blinded instead of confused when damaged by a wand of light.
  • Piror to 0.31, wands of light could blind nonliving and undead monsters.
  • The wand of light was added in 0.29.
